button.pay.description: Button text for paying an order.

button.continuePay.description: Button text for continuing to pay an order.

button.checkDetail.description: Button text for checking the details of an order.

button.query.description: Button text for querying an order.

button.finish.description: Button text for manually completing an order.

button.update.description: Button text for updating an order.

field.id.description: The identification number of an order.

field.amount.description: The monetary amount of an order.

field.price.description: The monetary price of an order.

field.createdAt.description: The time when the order was created.

field.payWay.description: The method of payment for an order.

field.api.description: An online service known as an application programming interface.

field.proxy.description: An online service used for transmitting data, such as an HTTP proxy.

message.orderExpired.message: Order has expired. Please create a new order to proceed with the payment.
message.orderExpired.description: Message indicating that the order has expired.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Please open WeChat on your mobile device and scan to complete the payment.
message.wechatPayHelp.description: Message providing guidance for WeChat payment.

message.free.description: Message indicating that the order is free of charge.

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Please complete the payment via an external link.
message.buyInExternalUrl.description: Message indicating payment through an external link.

message.confirmFinish.message: This action will manually set the order to a paid status and complete the distribution process. It cannot be undone. Please confirm that the customer has completed the payment. Do you want to proceed?
message.confirmFinish.description: Confirmation message for completing an order.

state.pending.description: The status of an order, indicating that the order is still awaiting payment from the user.

state.paid.description: The status of an order, indicating that the order has been paid.

state.expired.description: The status of an order, indicating that the order has timed out.

state.failed.description: The status of an order, indicating that the payment for the order has failed.

title.info.description: Title used for the website, indicating order information.

title.wechatPay.description: Title used for the website, indicating WeChat payment.

title.aliPay.description: Title used for the website, indicating Alipay payment, which is an online payment method.

title.stripe.description: Title used for the website, indicating Stripe payment, which is an online payment method.

title.manageOrder.description: Title used for the website, indicating order management.
